mapper.select: /* USE : VirtualLoginMapper.checkVirtualLoginAuth */ SELECT COUNT(twri.RESRCE_CD) AS CNT FROM TB_WB_RESRCE_INFO twri WHERE twri.RESRCE_CD IN ( SELECT twagr.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_GRP_RESRCE twagr WHERE twagr.AUTH_GRP_CD = ( SELECT twui.AUTH_GRP_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_INFO twui WHERE twui.USER_ID = #{0} ) AND twagr.RESRCE_CD = '000085' AND twagr.USE_YN = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT twae.RESRCE_CD FROM TB_WB_AUTHOR_EXCEPT twae WHERE twae.USER_ID = #{0} AND twae.RESRCE_CD = '000085' AND twae.INCLD_EXCLD_FG = 'I' AND twae.USE_YN = 'Y' )
